solution: Brite OEB is highly effective for removing wine and other organic/protein stains from fabrics. Use as directed in a laundry cycle.
Use Brite OEB or Oxy Brite for organic stains like coffee on fabrics. For hard surfaces, use R&R Degreaser if the stain is persistent.
Delta Green is our specialized non-slip floor cleaner for kitchens. For heavy industrial grease, use Dynamo-X or R&R Degreaser.
Bath Butler is designed specifically to remove lime and hard water deposits safely from fixtures.
Brite OEB contains enzymes specifically designed to break down protein-based stains like blood, grass, and food.
Use Calcium Lime Rust Remover for mineral and oxidation stains on compatible hard surfaces.
Brite OEB or Shot Maker are excellent for removing blood and organic soils from laundry.
For gym floors (usually rubber or wood), Maintenance Master is our go-to neutral cleaner. It cleans without leaving a film or dulling the finish, making it safe for daily use on athletic surfaces.
